languages.text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. Однако..." {n}Тонкие губы Клеменции едва заметно кривятся.{/n} "Чувства губернатора меня мало волнуют, но я обязана предупредить — ваше действие или бездействие могут трактовать определенным образом. Разрешите откланяться".

"Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. Now, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will excuse me."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. Однако..." {n}Тонкие губы Клеменции едва заметно кривятся.{/n} "Чувства губернатора меня мало волнуют, но я обязана предупредить — ваше действие или бездействие могут трактовать определенным образом. Разрешите откланяться".

traits.locale_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips curl slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your actions or a lack thereof may be interpreted in a certain way. I'll take my leave now."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips curl slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your actions or a lack thereof may be interpreted in a certain way. I'll take my leave now."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. I shall take my leave now."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. I shall take my leave now."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. Now, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will excuse me."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “遵命，大人，不过……”{n}她的薄唇微微地扭曲着。{/n}“我并不在乎总督的感受，但我需要提醒您，您的行为可能会被别人以某些特定方式来解读。言已至此，请允许我先行告退，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. Now, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人，不过……”{n}她的薄唇微微地扭曲着。{/n}“我并不在乎总督的感受，但我需要提醒您，您的行为可能会被别人以某些特定方式来解读。我先告辞了。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Naturalmente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo...» {n}Sus estrechos labios se arrugan ligeramente.{/n} «Aunque los sentimientos del gobernador no me conciernen, debo advertirle de que sus acciones o su inacción pueden interpretarse de cierta manera. Ahora, si me disculpa...».
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. Now, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo...» {n}Sus estrechos labios giran un poco.{/n} «Aunque los sentimientos del gobernador no me conciernen, debo advertirle de que sus acciones o su inacción se interpretarán de alguna manera. Por el momento, debo retirarme».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「承知いたしました、陛下。ですが…」{n}彼女の薄い唇がわずかに歪む。{/n}「総督がどう思うか私が気に掛けることではございません。だけど警告だけします…あなたが動いたことも動かなかったことも、特定の意味に捉えられる可能性があるのです。では、失礼します」
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. Now, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: 「承知いたしました、陛下。ですが…」{n}彼女の薄い唇がわずかに上がった。{/n}「総督がどう思うか私が気に掛けることではございませんが――あなたの行動や不作為が、人によっては違う意味に解釈される可能性があるということだけお伝えしておきます。では、失礼します」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Allerdings ..." {n}Ihre schmalen Lippen zucken unmerklich.{/n} "Die Gefühle des Gouverneurs gehen mich nichts an, doch ich muss Euch warnen – Euer Handeln, aber auch Eure Tatenlosigkeit können in eine bestimmte Richtung gedeutet werden. Wenn Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} mich jetzt entschuldigen würden."
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. Now, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Allerdings ..." {n}Ihre Lippen verziehen sich leicht.{/n} "Die Gefühle des Gouverneurs gehen mich nichts an, doch ich muss Euch warnen – Euer Handeln, aber auch Eure Tatenlosigkeit können in eine bestimmte Richtung gedeutet werden. Ich darf mich verabschieden."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Très certainement, Votre Seigneurie. Néanmoins... {n}hésite Clémentia en tordant légèrement les lèvres.{/n} Les sentiments du gouverneur sont le cadet de mes soucis, mais je me dois de vous prévenir : chacune de vos actions, et même l'absence d'action, sera sujette à interprétation. Sur ce, si vous voulez bien m'excuser... »
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. Now, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: « Très certainement, Votre Seigneurie. Néanmoins... {n}hésite Clémentia en se tordant très légèrement les lèvres.{/n} Les sentiments du gouverneur sont le cadet de mes soucis, mais je me dois de vous prévenir : chacune de vos actions, et même l'absence d'action, sera sujette à interprétation. Sur ce, je vais prendre congé. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Muhakkak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak..." {n}İnce dudakları hafifçe bükülüyor.{/n} "Valinin ne düşündüğü beni ilgilendirmez fakat sizi uyarmalıyım. Yaptıklarınız veya yapmadıklarınız, çeşitli yorumlamalara konu olabilir. Müsaadenizle {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. However..." {n}Her thin lips twist slightly.{/n} "I do not concern myself with the governor's feelings, but I must warn you — your action or inaction may be interpreted in a certain way. Now, if Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} will excuse me."

traits.locale_text: "Muhakkak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak..." {n}İnce dudakları, hafifçe bükülüyor.{/n} "Valinin ne düşündüğü beni ilgilendirmez fakat sizi uyarmalıyım: Yaptıklarınız veya yapmadıklarınız, bazı yorumlara yol açabilir. Müsaadenizle {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
traits.speaker: Clemence
